PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Guide by ^xD02090Allie^7 https://www.twitch.tv/Allliee_ https://www.youtube.com/c/Alliee
^xD02090EXTREMELY IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT MJOLNIR PLEASE READ THIS PLEASE^7
Mjolnir has ^xD02090EXTREMELY^7 important breakpoints. If you do not know about them they can seriously impact your dps, reducing it by up to ^xD0209050%^7 even if you go over it ever so slightly. This might sound scary but its very very simple you just have to keep these numbers in mind:
^xFFFF770-8% CDR^7^7 - ^xD02090NO MORE^7 than ^x70FF703.79 Cyclone APS^7 ^xFFFF779-37% CDR^7 - ^xD02090NO MORE^7 than ^x70FF704.33 Cyclone APS^7 ^xFFFF7737%+ CDR^7 - ^xD02090NO MORE^7 than ^x70FF705.05 Cyclone APS^7
^x70FF70How to start this build^7
Level in any way you wish to level a Templar. ^xD02090There is NO way to level as manabond and this is a build you swap to at lvl 85+. ^7 ^xD02090DO NOT try to play this at ~lvl 65 it will not work and feel bad to play.^7
I ^xD02090STRONGLY^7 recommend leveling to lvl 65, then get chaos res cap and 3-4k hp and buy a 5 way carry to level 90-95, 95 will cost you ~2-3 Div and ~1 hour of your time. Don't waste time manually leveling unless you really want to.
Some Recommendations on How To Level
^x7070FFSpark^7 - Super comfy and easy to do ^x7070FFRF^7 - Works really well now with the mastery changes ^xAF6025Hollow Palm^7 - Twink leveling setup that lets you speedrun
^x70FF70Gear^7
Basic overview of every slot and what to look for.
^xFFFF77IN GENERAL^7 - Fit ^xD02090resistances^7 & ^xE05030Str^7 wherever you can fit. ^xAF6025Mjolnir^7 needs ^xE05030412 Str^7 which can be hard to hit without ^xE05030Str^7 rolls on ^xFFFF77Rings & Jewels. Remember to use ^xFFFF77Harvest^7 ^xD02090Resistance^7 swapping to fix resistances. Try to fit ^x7070FFInt^7 and ^xFFFF77Mana^7 anywhere you can.
^xFFFF77Mana^7 - Direct dps increase through^x7070FF Manabond's^7 scaling & ^x7070FFArcane Cloak^7, ^x8888FFES^7 through ^xFFFF77Ascendancy^7 ^x7070FFInt^7 - ^x70FF70Accuracy Rating^7 through ^xAF6025Shaper's Touch^7 for ^x70FF70Cyclone^7, ^xFFFF77Mana^7 and ^x7070FF% ES^7
^x70FF70Helmet^7
The only helmet we can use in this is ^xAF6025Indigon^7. It gives us our scaling through "^x7070FF% increased Spell Damage for each 200 total Mana you have Spent Recently, up to 2000%^7" and is how we sit at low mana through "^x7070FF% increased Cost of Skills for each 200 total Mana Spent Recently^7"
Try to find as close to a max roll "^x7070FF% Spell Damage per 200 Mana^7" roll as this roll is a 7%^7 dps increase at a max roll vs a min roll. Try to keep the "^x7070FFIncreased Cost^7" roll under 55-56% or you will have mana issues.
For ^x7070FFEnchants^7 look for:
"^x7070FFArcane Cloak grants Life Regeneration equal to 15% of Mana Spent per Second^7" - This gives you ~^x7070FF1k ES Regen^7 through ^xFFFF77Zealot's Oath^7 "^x7070FF30% reduced Lightning Warp Duration^7" - This makes you extremely fast "^x7070FFManabond Penetrates 12% Lightning Resistance while on Low Mana^7" - ~10% dps increase
^x70FF70Chest^7
The only chest for this build is ^xAF6025Ivory Tower^7. This allows us to reserve all of our life while gaining ~^x7070FF3.5k ES^7. The cheap 6 links are most likely corrupted. Use ^xFFFF77Tainted Chromatic Orbs^7 to recolor it as needed.
Drop ^x70FF70Culling Strike^7 & ^x7070FFOvercharge^7 to fit in ^x7070FFLightning Warp^7 and ^xE05030Less Duration^7 for insane speed. Use ^x7070FFArc^7 for clearing or ^x7070FFShock Nova^7 for bossing/single target related strats.
Good Corrupts: ^xFFFF77+1 Max Res 50% Reduced Extra Crit Damage
^x70FF70Belt^7
We are looking to upgrade to a ^xAF6025Darkness Enthroned^7. This belt has been buffed in 3.21 to roll up to ^x7070FF100% inc effect^7. With this we can put "^xFFFF773% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate^7" ^xFFFF77Abyss Jewels^7 inside the belt to make them ^x7070FF6%^7.
Along with a ^xFFFF7710% CDR^7 roll on ^xAF6025Mjolnir^7 or ^xAF6025Squire^7 we can hit ^xFFFF7737% CDR^7 allowing us to gain an extra ^x70FF70.7 triggers^7 or ^xD02090~20% more dps^7.
On the Abyss Jewels you should aim for:
^xFFFF773% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate^7 - ^xD02090THIS IS MANDATORY ^7 ^xE05030Strength^7 - Helps fix str issues for ^xAF6025Mjolnir^7 ^xD02090Resistances^7 - Helps reach ^xD02090res^7 cap easier ^x70FF70Attack Speed^7 - Helps reach ^x70FF70Trigger Cap^7
^x70FF70Shield^7
For a shield we are upgrading to ^xAF6025Squire^7. This allows us to 6 link ^x7070FFManabond^7 which is ^xD02090~230% More Damage^7 over ^xAF6025Prism Guardian^7.
Look for a ^xFFFF7710% CDR^7 or ^xFFFF7715% CDR^7 crucible tree so you can hit ^xFFFF7737% CDR^7.
^x70FF70Boots^7
For boots we need an ^xFFFF77Elevated^7 ^x8888FFShaper^7 mod "^x8888FFx% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate^7". The ^xFFFF77Elevated^7 version lets it go to ^xFFFF7720%^7 as a max roll which is important. Ideally we want to combine these with ^xFFFF77Elevated Tailwind^7 boots for a large amount of as. For the rest of the stats we hope for ^xD02090EMPTY^7 suffix to craft "^x7070FFGrants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider^7" ^xD02090IMPORTANT:^7 This must go on boots as it has to be linked with ^xE05030Arrogance^7 for it to reserve life instead of ^xFFFF77Mana^7.
^xFFFF77Guide:^7
Step 1 Buy ^xFFFF77Elevated^7 ^x7070FFShaper^7 ^xFFFF77CDR^7 Boots Buy ^xFFFF77Elevated Tailwind^7 ^x70FF70Hunter^7 Boots ^xD02090MAKE SURE^7 the ^xFFFF77Elevated^7 mod is the only ^x8888FFinfluence^7 mod on the item. They will have ^x8888FFShaper^7 & ^x70FF70Hunter^7 in the mod names. ^xD02090MAKE SURE^7 one of the mods is on a ^xFFFF77Sorcerer Boots^7 base
Step 2: ^xFFFF77Awaken^7 the 2 boots together combining both onto the ^xFFFF77Sorcerer Boots^7^7 base using an ^xFFFF77Awakener's Orb^7. Step 3: Hope it has an ^xFFFF77open prefix^7. If not then yolo ^x7070FFannul^7 or sell them as is and try step 1 again. Step 4: Craft "^x8888FFSuffixes Cannot be Changed^7" and ^xFFFF77Veil Chaos Orb^7. Craft ^xFFFF77Maximum Life & Life Regen Hybrid^7 to block if you have an open prefix and ^xD02090THEN^7 unveil for higher odds at ^x70FF70Movement Speed^7. Step 5: Craft Mana if you have an ^xFFFF77open prefix^7 and ^xFFFF77Exalted Orb Slam^7 if you still have something open. Step 6: Beastcraft "Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider"
Step 6: ^xD02090THIS IS IMPORTANT^7 - ^xFFFF77Divine^7 the ^xFFFF77CDR^7 as needed to make you reach 37% CDR if you do not have a 100% roll Darkness Enthroned.
^x70FF70Gloves^7
The only gloves this build wants is ^xAF6025Shaper's Touch^7.
These gloves give us lots of ^xFFFF77Mana^7 for ^xE05030Str^7, ^x70FF70Accuracy Rating^7 for ^x7070FFInt^7 allowing us to freely hit cap ^x70FF70Cyclone^7 & Lots of ^x70FF70Evasion^7 and ^x7070FFEs^7 scaling. ^xAF6025Shaper's Touch^7 fit in so well, especially given that at a higher budget this build turns into an attribute stacker getting large amounts of ^xE05030Str^7 and ^x7070FFInt^7.
Get either ^x7070FFElemental Weakness^7 or ^x7070FFEnfeeble^7 as a corrupt. These are super cheap and amazing.
^x70FF70Rings^7
For rings we will be using them as ^xFFFF77filler slots^7 for ^xD02090resistances^7 & Str. If you don't need more then try to find rings with ^x7070FFInt^7 & ^xFFFF77Mana^7 to scale harder. Ideally you find ^xFFFF77Amethyst Rings^7 for^xD02090 Chaos Res^7 to make everything a bit comfier or ^xFFFF77Cerulean Rings^7 for even more mana.
^x70FF70Amulet^7
The only real option still is ^xE05030Astramentis^7. This amulet will let you get the ^xE05030Str^7 you need substantially easier and pretty much take care of all ^x70FF70Dex^7 by itself. Nothing comes close to this and is basically build glue until you spend more money.
On higher budgets get a talisman with "^x7070FF% Attributes^7" as this will give you a substantial amount of ^x7070FFInt^7 and ^xE05030Str^7. You might have Dex problems so this is up to you. I wouldnt recommend a talisman until you have everything else and can try to figure out how to fit it in.
^x70FF70Flasks^7
^xAF6025Coruscating Elixir^7 is needed in this build or you will have random deaths. Due to us wanting to be at 0 Mana for ^x7070FFManabond^7, we will do everything we can to sit at low mana. Because of this, ^xD02090Chaos Damage^7 might kill you as ^xAF6025Ivory Tower^7 redirects it to ^xFFFF77Mana^7 which we want to have very little of. ^xAF6025Coruscating^7 redirects it to ^x7070FFES^7 making us safe while mapping.
^xFFFF77IN "EASY" CONTENT^7 - You might need to use a ^xFFFF77Mana Flask^7. If monsters die too quickly you will not be able to get enough ^x70FF70Mana Leech^7 to keep your mana at a stable level.
Use your preferred set of ^x8888FFUtility^7 flasks, there are no required flasks in this but, most dont do anything wanting us to go defensive flasks. ^xADAA47Topaz^7 and ^x3F6DB3Sapphire^7 are amazing early budget defensive options. Try to get "^x7070FFGain 3 Charges when you are Hit by an Enemy^7" on the prefix as we will be in the middle of monsters quite a lot giving us great flask uptime.
^x70FF70Gems^7
^xFFFF77Unique Jewels in this build:^7
^xAF6025Impossible Escape^7 - We want to get one with ^xFFFF77Necromatic Aegis^7. This allows us to pick up amazing notables without making us have to path through them. If you cannot afford this path manually and ignore ^xFFFF77Path of the Savant^7.
^xAF6025Watcher's Eye^7 - You need to get "^x7070FFGain (6-10)% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield while affected by Clarity^7" as a minimum. This roll gives us so much ^x7070FFEnergy Shield^7 and is 30-40c at most.
^xAF6025Split Personality^7 - These have a few rolls on them and can be swapped around based on what you need. Make sure to put these in the top right cluster to abuse the way they scale.
Run ^x70FF70Accuracy Rating^7 on low ^x7070FFInt^7 until you get enough ^x70FF70Accuracy Rating^7 from ^xAF6025Shaper's Touch^7. Try to find ^x7070FFInt^7 on whatever you get no matter what Run ^xE05030Str^7 if you need help with strength Run ^xFFFF77Mana^7 to scale harder
^x70FF70
